name: Legend of the Wargod (Alpha)
description:
Legend of the Wargod is a single-player RPG, currently in development.

Follow Zieg on his quest to recover his stolen voice.
Traverse great keeps, vivacious towns, mystical lands, desolate battlefields and more as you uncover the truth and the actors behind the now revived Great War. Learn about the magical power of the Voice and fulfil your role as this age's Wargod!

[[Note]] This is an alpha build, some features are missing and the experience may not accurately reflect the final build.
